#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
    {
     string ar;
     cin>>ar;
    
     long int i,l,x=0,y=0;
    
     l=ar.size();
     
     for(i=0;i<l;i++)
      {              
       if(ar[i]=='T')
       x++;
       
       else
       y++;
        
        if(x<y)
        {           
         break;           
        }
      }   

      if(x==y)               
      cout<<"YES"<<"\n";
      
      else 
      cout<<"NO"<<"\n";         
   }
    return 0;
}
